bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition of a communicable disease acquired by females through sexual intercourse with a male who had just been cured of harm caused by cold. Zhu bing yuan hou lun 諸病源候論 8: 男子 病新瘥未平復，而婦人與之交接得病者，名陽易 , “The disease acquired by a woman who had intercourse with a male who had just been cured of the disease without having fully recovered yet, it is called ‘ yang exchange ’”.
